description: Make your own juicy spiced beef kofta paired with a zesty celery heart and cabbage salad. You can't beat this recipe for a quick and easy dinner.
name: Beef Kofta With Celery Heart & Cabbage Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup continental parsley, leaves and stalks separated, finely chopped
1 tbs harissa Middle Eastern spice blend (see Tip)
4 small wholemeal pita bread rounds, halved, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat barbecue flat plate on high heat. Combine mince, egg, parsley stalks and spice blend in a large bowl. Season. Using damp hands, shape 1/4 cup mince mixture around 1 large metal skewer to form kofta. Repeat with remaining mince mixture to make a total of 12 kofta.
Cook kofta on greased flat plate for 8 minutes, turning occasionally, or until browned and cooked through.
Meanwhile, combine cabbage, celery, lemon juice and oil in a large bowl. Season.
Serve kofta with salad, bread, peppers and yoghurt topped with parsley leaves and pepper.
